roleset.name: feeling that someone/thing exceeded expectations

roles.note: If an instrument separate from arg0 appears, please add the role in accordance with the verb frame. I'm fairly certain that such instances will not be treed as adjectives, however.

example.name: args0, 1
example.text: I have to say I 'm quite impressed with what I saw , if he sticks at it he 'll be a champ in the next few years .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, impress-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1.
